title: Predictive Sales Engine
problem: E-commerce brands were losing 30% revenue due to stock-outs and overstocking issues.
solution: Developed an XGBoost regression model with automated feature engineering for demand forecasting.

title: AI SaaS Dashboard
problem: Raw data was inaccessible to non-technical stakeholders for real-time decision making.
solution: Built a full-stack platform with interactive D3.js charts and automated reporting.

title: Customer Churn Analysis
problem: High attrition rates in subscription services without identifiable behavioral patterns.
solution: Performed EDA on 50k+ records and implemented a Random Forest classifier for risk detection.

title: NLP Sentiment Bot
problem: Customer support teams were overwhelmed by high volumes of unclassified feedback.
solution: Engineered a BERT-based transformer model to categorize sentiments in real-time.

title: FinTech Portfolio App
problem: Users lacked a unified interface to track crypto and stock assets with live updates.
solution: Developed a secure dashboard using WebSocket for real-time price streaming and tracking.

title: Supply Chain Optimizer
problem: Logistics bottlenecks causing delayed deliveries across multiple regions.
solution: Applied Linear Programming and Route Optimization algorithms to reduce transit time.
